articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to H-bomb Test 
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un invited nuclear scientists, technicians, soldier-builders, workers and officials who contributed to succeeding in the first H-bomb test of Juche Korea to the building of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and had a photo session with them.
					 When he appeared in front of the building of the WPK Central Committee, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 He extended warm greetings to the participants, waving back to them with a bright smile on his face.
					
					 He highly appreciated nuclear scientists, technicians, soldier-builders, workers and officials for having glorified the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in developing the Juche-oriented national defense industry by succeeding in the first H-bomb test of Juche Korea, and brought about a great event to be specially recorded in the national history spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 He had a photo session with the participants, expressing expectation and conviction that they will make uninterrupted advance and innovation with the same vim and vigor with which they succeeded in the H-bomb test on the principle of giving priority to self-development and thus achieve greater successes in the scientific researches for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol and Pak To Chun.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Hailed in Each Province
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Hailed in Each Province
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Joint army-civilian meetings for welcoming Juche Korea's first successful H-bomb test respectively took place in South Hwanghae, Kangwon, North Hamgyong, and South Hamgyong provinces on Monday.
					 Present there were officials of the local party and power bodies, working people's organizations, factories, enterprisers, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people, youths and students.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government was read out and congratulatory speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Speakers said that January 6, the  day of the DPRK's successful H-bomb test, was the day of a great deed in history as great Kim Il Sung's, Kim Jong Il's and Kim Jong Un's Korea demonstrated the dignity of the greatest and strongest great Paektusan nation in the world.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The successful H-bomb test brought about an exciting reality in which the whole world looks up to the nuclear power of Juche, socialist Korea and the great Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The DPRK's access to smaller H-bomb of justice to cope with the moves of the brigandish U.S. to provoke a war of aggression against the inviolable DPRK, while threatening it with nuclear weapons, is the legitimate right of a sovereign state for self-defense and a very just step no one can slander.
					
					 The successful first H-bomb test conducted by Juche Korea with indigenous wisdom, unique technology and efforts constitutes the highest tribute and loyalty to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and reflection of the WPK's unshakable faith and will to steadfastly advance along the unchangeable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The speakers underscored the need to demonstrate the dignity and might of the nuclear power to the world, bearing in mind the national pride and honor of being led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens on Founding Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens on Founding Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition "Sun and Youth Powerhouse" was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos showing the personalities of the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 "Great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung during the period when he brought up young revolutionaries in the new generation while cultivating the Juche line of the Korean revolution" and other photos deal with the exploits he performed by establishing the tradition of the Juche-oriented youth movement and bringing up the young people to be masters of new Korea.
					
					 "Great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il handing torches of revolution to members of young vanguard" and other photos deal with his great personality of training the young people to be successors to the Juche-oriented revolution.
					
					 "Great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung among the participants in the New Year's eve performance for 1994" and "Great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace" and other photos show their great personalities.
					
					 Photos displayed include "Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un delivering a historic speech at the ceremony marking the completion of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station" and "Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un watching the torchlight procession of members of the young vanguard." 
					
					 Among the photos on display are those showing the first ranks of vanguard fighters of the Young Communist League who held Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the great leader and the young people who performed feats in building monumental structures of the Paektusan youth powerhouse.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league, youth and students.
					
					 An opening speech was made by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held meetings at Nampho and Wonsan ports Monday to hail the DPRK's success in its first H-bomb test.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho and Wonsan cities and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings held by captains and crewmen of the Panama-flagged ships Oupulai 18, Sapai, Kiribati-flagged ship New Global.
					
					 The speakers warmly congratulated the Korean people on the success in the first H-bomb test, saying that the DPRK proudly joined the advanced nuclear weapons states, an exercise of a legitimate self-defensive right of a sovereign state and just and aboveboard measure.
					
					 The DPRK's such tremendous military capability is ascribable to the iron-willed grit and pluck and Songun politics of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, they noted.
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people would make big progress in their sacred struggle to protect their independent rights, the speakers extended firm solidarity to them in their struggle to ward off a war and defend peace.
					
					  Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Brass Wares Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Brass Wares Popular in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK turns out varieties of popular products and commodities conducive to the improvement of people's livelihood.
					 Among them are brass wares produced by the Pyongyang Taesong Jewel Processing Factory. They are such 10-odd kinds of utensils as cooking brazier, tableware, kettle and tea-cup widely used by Koreans from olden times.
					
					 According to Ri Chol Bae, manager of the Factory, those products are now winning a great popularity among the citizens as they are good in quality and comfortable in use and lighter and better in weight and shape than the past ones.
					
					 The brass wares gained favor at exhibitions held in different countries. 
					
					 Brass cooking brazier, spoon and chopsticks and vessels for noodle and boiled rice were appreciated as the best home products in December 2015 and awarded the December 15 medals for quality and certificate.

articles.title: To React to Nuclear Weapons in Kind Is DPRK's Mode of Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
To React to Nuclear Weapons in Kind Is DPRK's Mode of Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The nuclear landscape of the world has dramatically changed and the DPRK proudly joined the advanced nuclear weapons states by having access to H-bomb, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The U.S. is to blame for these developments, the article says, stressing the U.S. has long posed nuclear threats to the DPRK in a systematic way.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The DPRK needed a countermeasure as the U.S. brandished a nuclear stick and made it clear that it would destroy the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. misunderstood the DPRK. The Bush administration's DPRK policy that stemmed from its ignorance of the DPRK resulted in making the DPRK a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 It was a natural product of the misguided policy toward the DPRK. The U.S. had to draw a lesson from it, though belatedly.
					
					 But it kept its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 As the U.S. was seized by a foolish ambition to bring down the DPRK, the latter could not but choose to bolster war deterrence in a new advanced way to cope with the U.S. harsh hostile policy and nuclear threats to the DPRK as it had already warned Washington.
					
					 The DPRK's first H-bomb test was conducted on Jan. 6, shaking the earth.
					
					 The U.S. was gravely mistaken.
					
					 It is seriously mistaken if it seeks to bring down the DPRK by force of arms. It is a pipe dream.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster its nuclear deterrence of justice qualitatively and quantitatively as along as it deems it necessary to safeguard the sovereignty of the country, the right to existence of the nation and the peace in the Korean Peninsula and the region if the U.S. does not pay heed to the advice of the DPRK and persists in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted by Foreign Organizations on Their Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted by Foreign Organizations on Their Websites
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and institutions of different countries and regional and international bodies posted Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address on their websites between January 1 and 6.
					 The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia posted the full text of the New Year address on its website.
					
					 The full text of the New Year Address or its detailed gist were posted by the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and other different organizations of Russia, the Socialist Party of Romania, the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the MS Travel Company of Germany, the Brazilian Communist Party, the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions and the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on their websites illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali and the Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador posted the part dealing with Korea's reunification of the New Year Address on their websites.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Tajikistan, Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Tajikistan, Spain
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- A reading session and a seminar on Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address took place in Tajikistan and Spain on January 4 and 5.
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said at a reading session that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was arousing a lively response worldwide.
					
					 The Communist Party of Tajikistan extended full support to the New Year Address and wished the Korean people great successes in the struggle for smashing the challenges of the imperialists, building an economic power, improving the people's living standard and achieving the reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Spain and other speakers praised Kim Jong Un as a great leader who is shattering the U.S. and their followers' persistent moves to stifle the DPRK with his matchless grit and courage and strenuously leading the DPRK to victory only. 
					
					 The New Year Address serves as guidelines indicating the way of victory for the Korean people to follow this year, they said, and went on:
					
					 Deep study of the New Year Address helped know better his patriotic intention of loving the people and the nation and his firm will for Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland－Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on January 1, supporting Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The statement said:
					
					 He called for more dynamically waging the movement for national reunification holding up the slogan "Let us frustrate the challenges by the anti-reunification forces within and without and usher in a new era of independent reunification!" this year.
					
					 He urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to halt the dangerous aggressive war exercises and stop the military provocations escalating the tension and expressed the DPRK's will to make active efforts for north-south dialogue and improved relations.
					
					 His New Year Address serves as historic guidelines for the Korean people to achieve successes in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification this year.

articles.title: Three Principles for National Reunification, North-South Declarations Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Three Principles for National Reunification, North-South Declarations Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Figures of Iran and Austria issued statements on January 4 and 5, supporting the part dealing with the issue of Korea's reunification of Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran said that Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, set forth peace-loving and independent line and policy for achieving peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and carrying out the cause of reunification in his New Year Address.
					
					 The chairman wished that north and south of Korea would value agreements common to the nation including the three principles for national reunification and the north-south declarations and pave the way of improving the inter-Korean relations on the basis of them.
					
					 A member of the leadership of the Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria said:
					
					 The Korean reunification is the most urgent and vital task for the Korean nation.
					
					 The above-said principles and declarations are the most fair and aboveboard programmes for reunification as they reflect all Koreans' desire and wishes for reunification.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities not to pursue the unilateral "unification of social systems" contrary to the trend toward inter-Korean dialogue and improved relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop staging dangerous war exercises in collusion with the U.S. every year to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should unconditionally meet the DPRK's demand for defusing the danger of war, easing the tension and creating a peaceful climate on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia junto con los contribuyentes a prueba de bomba de hidrogeno
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia junto con los contribuyentes a prueba de bomba de hidrogeno
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un llamo al edificio del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a los nucleares cientificos, tecnicos, constructores militares, obreros y funcionarios, quienes hicieron aporte a la primera prueba exitosa de la bomba de hidrogeno de Corea del Juche y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio ante el edificio del CC del PTC, todos los participantes le dieron calurosas aclamaciones.
					
					El Mariscal les envio con amplia sonrisa el saludo cordial agitando la mano alzada.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas de los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares, constructores militares, obreros y funcionarios quienes alcanzaron exitos perfectos en la primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la Corea del Juche, haciendo brillar eternamente las inmortales proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il  realizadas ante el desarrollo de la autoctona industria  para la defensa nacional y prepararon un gran acontecimiento a ser registrado especialmente en la historia de 5 milenios de la nacion coreana.
					
					Expuso su esperanza y conviccion de que los participantes lograran mayores exitos en la investigacion cientifica orientada a consolidar mas el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo al avanzar y renovar sin cesar con el impetu de haber realizado con exito la prueba de bomba H enarbolando el lema de priorizar sus propias fuerzas.
					
					Le acompanaron Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol y Pak To Chun.

articles.title: Continuan mitines conjuntos provinciales para felicitar prueba de bomba de hidrogeno
articles.content:
Continuan mitines conjuntos provinciales para felicitar prueba de bomba de hidrogeno
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 11 en las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur, Kangwon, Hamgyong del Norte y el Sur los mitines conjuntos de militares y civiles para felicitar el exito de la primera prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno de Corea del Juche. 
					Participaron alli los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, planteles docentes, etc., los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de respectivas localidades. 
					
					En los mitines se dieron lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hubo discursos de felicitacion. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el 6 de enero en que se realizo con exito la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la RPDC, es el dia de acontecimiento historico en que la Corea de Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un manifesto a todo el mundo la dignidad de la potencia Paektusan mas grandiosa y potente en el mundo. 
					
					Gracias al exito de la prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno, el mundo admira a la potencia nuclear del Juche, la Corea socialista y el gran Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dijeron. 
					
					Continuaron que la RPDC posee la bomba de hidrogeno minimizada para hacer frente a la maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., lo cual es el legitimo derecho de autodefensa y justa medida incensurable por nadie de un Estado soberano.
					
					Apuntaron que el exito de la primera prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno de la Corea del Juche por las inteligencias, tecnicas particulares y fuerzas propias de la RPDC es la expresion de sublime homenaje y fidelidad hacia el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la manifestacion de la firme conviccion y voluntad del PTC que marcha a pasos firmes por la orbita de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo. 
					
					Por ultimo, expusieron las decisiones de exaltar la dignidad y poderio de la potencia nuclear guardando en lo profundo del corazon el orgullo y dignidad nacionales de tener al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion fotografica por 70o aniversario de UJS
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion fotografica por 70o aniversario de UJS
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la exposicion fotografica "El Sol y la potencia de la juventud" en celebracion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung. 
					En la sede del certamen se veian las fotos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y las otras alusivas a los nobles rasgos de los grandes hombre sin iguales del monte Paektu. 
					
					"Presidente Kim Il Sung en la epoca en que maduraba la linea del Juche de la Revolucion Coreana y formaba a los revolucionarios jovenes de nueva generacion" y otras fotos reflejan las proezas del lider coreano quien preparo la tradicion del autoctono movimiento juvenil y formo a los jovenes como duenos de la nueva Corea. 
					
					Las fotos incluyendo "Dirigente Kim Jong Il entregando la antorcha de la revolucion a las vanguardias juveniles" describen los nobles rasgos de este gran hombre quien formo a los jovenes como continuadores de la revolucion del Juche. 
					
					Tambien, figuran las fotos que muestran los rasgos de los grandes hombres sin par entre otras "Presidente Kim Il Sung con los participantes en la funcion artistica por el Ano Nuevo 1994", "Dirigente Kim Jong Il realiza la visita de orientacion al Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Samjiyon". 
					
					Las fotos "Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronunciando un historico discurso en la ceremonia de inauguracion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan", "Mariscal Kim Jong Un ve el desfile con antorcha de los vanguardias juveniles", etc. demuestran las nobles cualidades del Mariscal. 
					
					Se distinguen las fotos que dan a conocer los meritos de los combatientes de la Union Comunista que apoyaron con fidelidad al Presidente Kim Il Sung y los jovenes que levantaron muchas creaciones monumentales de la potencia de la juventud Paektusan.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar este lunes en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo con la participacion del jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Il Hwan, los funcionarios de la UJS y los jovenes y estudiantes. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la UJS, Jon Yong Nam, pronuncio el discurso de apertura.
